#summary Mysql Book Table
#labels booktable,authortable,table

= *Book* 테이블 =

{{{
CREATE TABLE `book` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `page` int(4) NOT NULL,
  `isbn10` varchar(10) NOT NULL,
  `isbn13` varchar(13) NOT NULL,
  `publish_comp` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `publish_date` varchar(10) NOT NULL,
  `price` int(5) DEFAULT NULL,
  `size` varchar(9) DEFAULT NULL,
  `corver` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `category` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
}}}

= *Author* 테이블 =

{{{
CREATE TABLE `author` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `author_div` int(1) NOT NULL,
  `book_ref` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
}}}
